title: SmartLoader Attack Uses Trojanized Oura MCP Server to Deploy StealC Infostealer
description: Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed details of a new SmartLoader campaign that involves distributing a trojanized version of a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server associated with Oura Health to deliver an information stealer known as StealC.
